title: AneeMate
description: AneeMate is a fantasy world creature extraction shooter merging a childhood nostalgia with 21st century innovation. AneeMates are the mythical creatures you’ll truly own, introducing magical powers, unique designs, and body structures. Go save them all!
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **What is AneeMate?**
<!--text-->
AneeMate is a creature-bonding extraction shooter where connection beats conquest. You are not a master. You’re a spark — drawn to a place that only appears to those it deems worthy. Your journey begins the moment an AneeMate chooses you, creating a shared Aura: a radiant pulse that defines your Heart Power (HP), shapes your destiny, and unlocks the magic of fusion.

<!--image-->
![AneeMate-1m859](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d708d00f2bdc4b46882ef44aa876674a/aneemate-1m859.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Be Chosen, Not a Captor**
<!--text-->
AneeMates aren’t just caught — they need to connect. When one bonds with you, a unique Aura is formed, linking your health, power, and fate. Through this bond, a Magic Staff is born, channeling your AneeMate’s abilities in battle, exploration, and beyond.

<!--image-->
![AneeMate-1lu64](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d708d00f2bdc4b46882ef44aa876674a/aneemate-1lu64.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Organic Combat & Strategic Magic**
<!--text-->
Combat is alive with elemental strategy. Your Aura fuels your staff — when it drains, you lose all abilities. Refill it through exploration, smart energy management, and collecting Myst — a rare magical essence used for crafting, evolving, and unlocking powerful Fusion abilities.

<!--image-->
![AneeMate-q3nsx](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d708d00f2bdc4b46882ef44aa876674a/aneemate-q3nsx.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Meet the Yipess: Living Magic Amplifiers**
<!--text-->
Yipess are living, organic beings, not just tools. Their elemental nature influences your bond with AneeMates, and merging them creates Mega Yipess, powerful allies that amplify magic, enable cinematic captures, and unlock sacred zones filled with rare resources.

<!--image-->
![AneeMate-ni5go](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d708d00f2bdc4b46882ef44aa876674a/aneemate-ni5go.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Explore a World That Reacts to You**
<!--text-->
NPCs learn. The island evolves. Thanks to AI Sentients, the world of Animara will change with player behavior, emotional tone, and community energy. No two journeys will be alike — this is a living legend shaped by real-world curiosity and connection.

<!--image-->
![AneeMate-1wbtj](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/d708d00f2bdc4b46882ef44aa876674a/aneemate-1wbtj.jpg)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **Ownership**
<!--text-->
Don't just bond with your AneeMate - own it! All those adorable, whimsical creatures and their talents can be yours. Thanks to digital assets ownership, your Hidden Island experience is yours to own. Let your AneeMates, heroes, resources, and skills be your unique property.
